Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to including certain members of the Court Officers Benevolent Association of Suffolk County in the MTA Long Island Railroad no fare program
Summary: Relates to including officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, majors and chiefs of the Court Officers Benevolent Association of Suffolk county in the MTA Long Island Rail Road no fare program.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to including certain members of the Court Officers Benevolent Association of Suffolk County in the MTA Long Island Railroad no fare program
